constants.name: MSPowerAppsEmail

decisions.description: condition - When a CAR case is created or updated involving specific scenario (excluding created only scenarios).
decisions.name: CAR_Scenarios
decisions.label: CAR Scenarios

decisions.description: Condition - When a Dispute Claim case is created or updated involving specific scenario (excluding created only scenarios).
decisions.name: Dispute_Claim_scenarios
decisions.label: Dispute Claim scenarios

Flow.description: Subflow for CaseDomain triggerred from CaseCommon AfterSave flow.

formulas.name: vClosedACKLatePayment
formulas.expression: AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Email_Address__c})), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'Closed'), {!vCase.Exclude_Notification_Automation__c} = false, {!vCase.Number_of_Items__c} > 0, {!vCase.PriorityNumber__c} > 0, {!vCase.Number_of_Items__c} = {!vCase.PriorityNumber__c}, OR(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Business_Unit__c}, 'Australia Post'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Business_Unit__c}, 'StarTrack')),ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Enquiry_Type__c}, 'Billing Dispute'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.ReasonforCreditClaim__c}, 'Late payment'))

formulas.name: vNewACK
formulas.expression: AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Email_Address__c})), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'New'), {!vCase.Exclude_Notification_Automation__c} = false, ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Business_Unit__c}, 'Australia Post'), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.ReasonforCreditClaim__c}, 'Late payment')), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Origin}, 'Email')) )

formulas.name: vNewACKLatePayment
formulas.expression: AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Email_Address__c})), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'New'), {!vCase.Exclude_Notification_Automation__c} = false, OR(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Business_Unit__c}, 'Australia Post'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Business_Unit__c}, 'StarTrack')), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Enquiry_Type__c}, 'Billing Dispute'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.ReasonforCreditClaim__c}, 'Late payment'))

formulas.name: vNewACKOriginEmail
formulas.expression: AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Email_Address__c})), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'New'), {!vCase.Exclude_Notification_Automation__c} = false, ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Business_Unit__c}, 'Australia Post'), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.ReasonforCreditClaim__c}, 'Late payment')), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Origin}, 'Email') )

formulas.name: vNewCaseArticleDamage
formulas.expression: AND({!vCase.TypeofDamage__c} = 'Wine Damage', ISPICKVAL({!vCase.ResolutionCode__c}, 'MyNetwork Resolution'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.EnquirySubType__c},'Facility reported damages'), {!vCase.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'SSSWDelivery', {!vCase.ContactId} <> Null, {!vCase.IsClosedOnCreate} )

formulas.name: vNewCaseGeneric
formulas.expression: (TEXT({!vCase.Type}) = 'Investigation' || (TEXT({!vCase.Type}) = 'General Enquiry' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) = 'MyPost Business') || TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) = 'BSP' ) && {!vCase.Subject} <> 'Bulk Upload' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Web' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Email' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Portal' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Snap It'&& TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'BSP Bulk Upload' && (TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Direct Email' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Bulk Upload') && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Contact.Email})) && ISBLANK({!vCase.ParentId})&& NOT(CONTAINS({!vCase.Subject},'Enterprise Contact Registration'))&& NOT({!vCase.TypeofDamage__c} = 'Wine Damage' && ISPICKVAL({!vCase.EnquirySubType__c},'Facility reported damages'))

formulas.name: vNewCaseWebPortal
formulas.expression: IF(OR(TEXT( {!vCase.CHASEnquiryType__c})=='Delivery issue',AND(TEXT( {!vCase.CHASEnquiryType__c})=='Products & services',TEXT( {!vCase.EnquirySubType__c} )=='Item transfer')), ( TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) = 'Web' || TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) = 'Portal' ) && (TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Direct Email' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Bulk Upload') && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Contact.Email})) && ISBLANK({!vCase.ParentId}) && NOT(CONTAINS({!vCase.Subject},'Enterprise Contact Registration')) && {!vCase.Automated_Network_Assignment__c} == false, ( TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) = 'Web' || TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) = 'Portal' ) && (TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Direct Email' && TEXT({!vCase.Origin}) <> 'Bulk Upload') && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Contact.Email})) && ISBLANK({!vCase.ParentId}) && NOT(CONTAINS({!vCase.Subject},'Enterprise Contact Registration')) && ISBLANK({!vCase.HeldToOpenOn__c}))

formulas.name: vNewCasewithinEDD
formulas.expression: ISPICKVAL({!vCase.CHASEnquiryType__c}, 'Missing or lost item') && OR(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Origin}, 'Web'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Origin}, 'Portal')) && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Contact.Email})) && ISBLANK({!vCase.ParentId}) && NOT(CONTAINS({!vCase.Subject}, 'Enterprise Contact Registration')) && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.HeldToOpenOn__c})) && ({!vCase.EstimatedDelivery__c} >= TODAY())

formulas.name: vNewCaseWithinEDDBusinessDays
formulas.expression: ISPICKVAL({!vCase.CHASEnquiryType__c}, 'Missing or lost item') && OR(ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Origin}, 'Web'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Origin}, 'Portal')) && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.Contact.Email})) && ISBLANK({!vCase.ParentId}) && NOT(CONTAINS({!vCase.Subject}, 'Enterprise Contact Registration')) && NOT(ISBLANK({!vCase.HeldToOpenOn__c})) && ({!vCase.EstimatedDelivery__c} < TODAY()) && (DATEVALUE({!vCase.HeldToOpenOn__c}) >= TODAY())

formulas.name: vNotifybyExceedEmail
formulas.expression: AND( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Work_Type__c}, 'Off the Shelf'), {!vCase.Case_Duration__c} = 15 ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Work_Type__c}, 'Intermediate'), {!vCase.Case_Duration__c} = 21 ), AND( ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Work_Type__c}, 'High Complexity'), {!vCase.Case_Duration__c} = 61 ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'Closed - Expired'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'Closed - Customer Viewed'), ISPICKVAL({!vCase.Status}, 'Closed - Pending') ) )

Flow.label: Case CaseDomain Subflow
